title: nanganallUr
sahitya:
nanganallUr ezhundaruL sarva mangaLE rAja rAjEshvari


anupallavi

  engum nirainda un iaiyaDi bhajikkum Ezhai aDimai enai ANDaruL perumai koL


caraNam    un perumaiyonrum ariyEn mei anbumilEn aruL virumbinEn
nin padam ninainduLLam urugi nAma bhajanamum purindilEn ishai paravum
